responsibilities: Led development of cloud infrastructure services handling 1M+ requests per second

Collaborated with product managers to define technical requirements
achievements: Reduced API latency by 40% through caching and query optimization
Increased system throughput by 3x by implementing async processing
Designed monitoring dashboard reducing incident response time by 60%

responsibilities: Developed backend services for user authentication and authorization

projects.name: AutoResumeFiller
projects.description: AI-powered desktop application that automates job application form filling by intelligently extracting information from resumes and generating contextual responses using GPT-4. Reduces application time from 20 minutes to 2 minutes per job.
highlights: Automated 80% of repetitive form filling tasks
Integrated with 3 AI providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google)
Implemented AES-256-GCM encryption for data security
Achieved 90%+ field detection accuracy across major ATS platforms

projects.name: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: Scalable WebSocket-based chat application supporting 10K+ concurrent connections with message persistence and real-time notifications.
highlights: Built real-time typing indicators and read receipts

summary: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years in backend development and cloud infrastructure. Specialized in building scalable microservices, optimizing distributed systems, and mentoring engineering teams. Passionate about leveraging AI and automation to solve real-world problems. Proven track record of reducing latency, increasing throughput, and delivering high-quality software in fast-paced environments.
